resources.string:
1. You will get a random letter from the App
2. Think of a dictionary word starting with the alphabet
3. Enter the second character of the word
4. Computer also thinks of a word and it enters it in the box
5. Go on entering character by character
6. When prompted, enter the full word.
7. If computer enters a longer word, it wins; else you win!!!

 Good Luck!!!"
